name: just a little game - snake
description:
This is a simple snake clone I've programmed for a tutorial by devquickie (german YouTuber, link to his chanal: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYN__gtyjw62SYAzV...)

Controls:

arrow keys: move Player

ENTER: change color to green

TAB: change color to Grey

SPACE: change color to red

SHIFT: change color to blue

0: change color to white
